original: Kāmānametaṁ nissaraṇaṁ yadidaṁ nekkhammaṁ, rūpānametaṁ nissaraṇaṁ yadidaṁ āruppaṁ, yaṁ kho pana kiñci bhūtaṁ saṅkhataṁ paṭiccasamuppannaṁ nirodho tassa nissaraṇaṁ—
analyzed: ▁kām ān ametaṃ ▁ni ssa raṇaṃ ▁yadidaṃ ▁nekkhamm aṃ ▁rūp ān ametaṃ ▁ni ssa raṇaṃ ▁yadidaṃ ▁ ā rupp aṃ ▁yaṃ ▁kho ▁pana ▁kiñci ▁bhūt aṃ ▁ saṃkhat aṃ ▁paṭicca sam uppanna ṃ ▁nirodh o ▁tassa ▁ni ssa raṇaṃ

original: imā kho, bhikkhave, tisso nissaraṇiyā dhātuyo”ti.
Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
